Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Accademia, you'll be centrally located in Rome, steps from Trevi Fountain and minutes from Galleria Alberto Sordi. This family-friendly hotel is close to Roman Forum and Colosseum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 75 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request).


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Trevi Fountain - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Galleria Alberto Sordi - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Palazzo Chigi - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Piazza Colonna - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Column of Marcus Aurelius - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Sistina Theater - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Palazzo Montecitorio - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Piazza di Pietra - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Quirinale Palace - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Church of Saint Ignatius of Loyola - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Piazza di Montecitorio - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Keats-Shelley House - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Caffe Greco - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Palazzo Barberini - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Piazza Barberini - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi

The nearest airports are:
Rome (CIA-Ciampino) - 14.5 km / 9 mi
Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.) - 22.6 km / 14 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Accademia is Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Hotel Accademia are:

Rome (FCO-Leonardo Da Vinci) - 22.6 km / 14 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Accademia is Rome (FCO-Leonardo Da Vinci).
